channel.title: Artillary Sidewinder X1 on Minimal 3DP
channel.description: Recent content in Artillary Sidewinder X1 on Minimal 3DP

item.title: Sidewinder X1 (SWX1) Klipper Config
item.description: SWX1 with a BTT SKR 2 GitHub Backup [include shell_command.cfg] [include fluidd.cfg] [include mainsail.cfg] # This file contains common pin mappings for the BigTreeTech SKR 2. # To use this config, the firmware should be compiled for the # STM32F407 with a "32KiB bootloader". # In newer versions of this board shipped in late 2021 the STM32F429 # is used, if this is the case compile for this with a "32KiB bootloader" # You will need to check the chip on your board to identify which you have.
